security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:name: Cup hit protection
security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:description: The cup must be protected from hitting against/--a other cups (or any other object) inside the box, or against the box itself, while being transported to its final destination

security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:name: Cup lost prevenction
security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:description: The cup must be protected so that it cannot be taken out of the box, while being transported to its final destination
